content.rendered:
[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”hero”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1545200810903{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″]

SMART Box™:
The best way
to compare business loans

[vc_column_text]Because sometimes, it’s good to think inside the box[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”lead”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″][vc_column_text]SMART Box™ is the new way to compare business loans. It stands for: Straightforward Metrics Around Rate and Total cost and shows key metrics so you can compare the cost of capital. Because when it comes to business loans, it pays to compare.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”main_content”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″]

When time is money, it pays to save both

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″][vc_column_text]We understand that time is money for business owners and we’re here to save you both. Use SMART Box™ to compare the most important metrics of a business loan so you can make a good business decision with confidence.

Below is an example SMART Box™ for a $10,000 business loan over a six-month term. When you apply, you will receive a SMART Box™ in your loan offer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” el_id=”table_container”][vc_column]

Example Loan Amount

$10,200.00

Disbursement Amount1

(Loan Amount less Origination Fee)

$10,000.00

Total Repayment Amount

(including Loan Amount, Interest Expense, and Other Fees)

$10,743.46

Term

(Repaid fortnightly)

6 Months

Metric

Metric Calculation

Metric Explanation

Total Cost of Credit

$743.46

Metric Calculation

Interest Expense: $543.46
Origination Fee: $200.00
Other Fees: $0.00
Total Cost of Credit: $743.46

Metric Explanation

This is the total amount you will pay in interest and other fees for the Loan.

The amount does not include fees and other charges you can avoid, such as interest at a default interest rate on overdue amounts, late payment fees and dishonour fees. See the agreement for details on these fees and charges (see clause 2.7 of Moula's Letter of Offer)

Average Monthly Payment

$1,796.57

Metric Calculation

Total Repayment Amount: $10,743.46
Term (in months): ÷ 5.96
Average Monthly Payment: $1,796.57

Metric Explanation

This is the Total Repayment Amount divided by the Term.

The amount does not include fees and other charges you can avoid, such as interest at a default interest rate on overdue amounts, late payment fees and dishonour fees. See the agreement for details on these fees and charges (see clause 2.7 of Moula's Letter of Offer).

This is an estimate for comparison purposes only.

Term (Months) = (Last Payment Date – Disbursement Date) * 12 / 365.25

Eg Term (Months) = (Monday 8th July 2019 – Monday 7th January 2019) * 12 / 365.25 = 182 * 12 / 365.25 = 5.96 months

Rounded up
For example = 182 * 12 / 365.25 ≈ 6 months

Total Interest Percentage (TIP)

5.33%

Metric Calculation

Interest Expense: $543.46
Loan Amount: ÷ $10,200.00
Total Interest Percentage: 5.33%

Metric Explanation

This is the Interest Expense expressed as a percentage of the Loan Amount.

This metric is exclusive of fees.

Annual Percentage Rate (APR)2

19.55%

Metric Calculation

Your Loan will have fortnightly payments of: $826.42
APR: 19.55%

Metric Explanation

This is the rate that can be used to calculate the cost of the loan, taking account of the reducing balance of the Loan Amount, expressed as an annual rate.

This metric is exclusive of fees.

Cents on the Dollar

5.33¢

Metric Calculation

Interest Expense and Other Fees: $543.46
Loan Amount: ÷ $10,200.00
Cents on the Dollar: 5.33¢

Metric Explanation

This is the amount of the Interest Expense and Other Fees (if any) that is payable for each dollar borrowed.

This metric is exclusive of Origination Fee.

Early Repayment

Does the early repayment of this Loan result in any new fees or charges?

No

Does the early full repayment of this Loan result in a reduction in the Total Repayment Amount?

Yes

(Refer to clause 15.2 of Moula's Business Lending General Terms)

1 The Disbursement Amount is the amount of the loan that is available for you and may be less than the Loan Amount. A portion of the Disbursement Amount may be used to pay off any amounts owed from a prior loan or an amount owed to a third party.

2 APR should be considered in conjunction with the Total Cost of Credit. For a particular loan, the APR is that APR required to solve the loan amount calculation formula made available on the AFIA Code of Lending Practice webpage (see https://afia.asn.au/AFIA-Online-Small-Business-Lenders-Code-of-Lending-Practice).

© 2018 Innovative Lending Platform Association. All rights reserved. Innovative Lending Platform Association is not responsible for any misuse of the SMART Box™ or any inaccuracies in the calculations or information included therein.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”footer_cta”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″]

No hidden fees. No surprises.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″][vc_column_text]We make it easy for you can understand the total cost of a Moula business loan upfront. In fact, we’re so passionate about transparency, we built a business loan calculator so you can see exactly how much a business loan will cost ahead of time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-4 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-sm-offset-3 vc_col-xs-12″]
Crunch our Numbers
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
